name: Dutton Estate Walk at Hinton Ampner

ai.summary: The Dutton Estate Walk at Hinton Ampner is a 9.1 km circular hike in the Hampshire countryside (UK). Rated moderate, the route combines estate paths, woodland trails, hedged lanes, and open fields for varied scenery and a pleasant workout.
ai.terrain_summary: Expect a mix of well-trodden gravel paths, grassy tracks, and occasional mud, with gentle climbs and a few short, uneven sections. The route may include gates or stiles and can be muddy after rain; footwear with good grip is recommended.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight hours before you go; stay on marked paths; inform someone of your plan and estimated return time. Be mindful of farm access along hedged lanes, dogs may be restricted in certain areas, and livestock can appear. Carry water, a light rain layer, a map or GPS, and a small first-aid kit; have a charged mobile phone for emergencies.
recommended_gear: Map and compass or GPS device
Light rain gear and extra layers
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer and Autumn are ideal for this 9.1 km walk; Winter visits are possible but expect mud, wet conditions, and shorter daylight.

seo.title: Dutton Estate Walk at Hinton Ampner – 9.1 km Moderate Hike in Hampshire, UK
seo.meta_description: Explore a 9.1 km circular hike around the Dutton Estate at Hinton Ampner, Hampshire. Moderate terrain with estate trails, woodland, and countryside views. Tips on gear and best seasons.
